definition: to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 陈澄的研究未注意系统性。

sentences.english: Clastic facies pattern recognition is somewhat systematic .
sentences.chinese: 碎屑岩相模式的识别是带有一定系统性的。

sentences.english: The patient has no known drug or food allergy, and there are no other systemic diseases.
sentences.chinese: 病人无特殊药物过敏史，也无其他系统性疾病。

sentences.english: Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) is a kind of autoimmunity disease caused by complicated factors.
sentences.chinese: 系统性红斑狼疮是一种病因复杂的自身免疫性疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To study the pathogenesis and genetic basis of systemic lupus erythematosus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨系统性红斑狼疮的发病机理和遗传基础。

sentences.english: Chapter four is the construction of the non-systemic banking risk alarming system of our country.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是我国银行非系统性危机预警指标体系的构建。

sentences.english: Contagion effect is the key problem of the Banking Systemic Risk(BSR).
sentences.chinese: 传染效应是银行系统性风险的核心问题。

sentences.english: The systematic review is based on 15 studies including 1,414 patients.
sentences.chinese: 系统性的综述基于15项共1414例患者的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the role of apoptotic cells in the disease development of systemic lupus erythematosus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨凋亡细胞在系统性红斑狼疮发病中的作用。

sentences.english: The article analyzes the application of tonifying kidney in the treatment of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE).
sentences.chinese: 着重分析补肾法在系统性红斑狼疮治疗中的应用。

sentences.english: Some systematic experiences for coming construction of more GPS fiducial stations in Fujian province are presented.
sentences.chinese: 为今后GPS基准站的建设提供了系统性的经验。

sentences.english: You can’t fix a systemwide problem by simply blaming or retraining individuals.
sentences.chinese: 对责任人进行指责或再培训，不能修复系统性问题。

sentences.english: What are the students' overall performances in the 2006 Territory-wide System Assessment?
sentences.chinese: 贵校学生2006年系统性评估的整体表现是如何？

sentences.english: Serologic evidence of a systemic vasculitis was present in 50% of patients.
sentences.chinese: 的患者有系统性脉管炎的血清学表现。

sentences.english: As head of the New York Federal Reserve, he was prescient about systemic risks to the financial system.
sentences.chinese: 作为纽约联储银行行长，他对系统性风险有先见之明。

sentences.english: The Chinese government clearly wants to encourage more systematic invention of this sort.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府明显希望鼓励出现更多这类系统性的发明。

definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
